text: This is a test of nerves for those who have done amazing things.
Never hide and never be intimidated.
Sports can be very good for health but so is healthy food.
Playing sports can help in getting better mentally and physically.When we eat healthy, we increase our immunity.
Economy has been impacted due to current globa situation.
Indeed the economic sitaution will change soon, do not be so gloomy my friend.
Economy and happiness go hand  in hand sometimes but sometimes they act like enemies.
Health is wealth and wisdom  is eternity.
Healthy, wealthy and wise. This is what she was.
